title: Jikai no Death Game ni Gokitai Kudasai!!
original_name: 次回のデスゲームにご期待ください!!
sinopse:
Yomi, a former nursery teacher, is now an employee at a company that manages death games. She becomes a host and organizes a death game that invites participants to their death... but in front of Yomi, a genius spoiled boy stands up as a participant!?

(Source: Shueisha, translated)
